title: Foliage SFX Pack
description: You will get hold of shuffles, breaks, shakes, rustle, hits, punches, and more creative handling, movement, manipulation takes from different perspectives. These meticulously recorded sounds have both practical usability and room for further sound design.
longDescription:
This one is very green! Boost your scenes with 571 impactful foliage sounds. Find the true sound of it with Vadi Sound Library.


571 Foliage sound effects bring you organic recordings of grass, branches, leaves, bushes, twigs, and lots of vegetation and rustle.


Set peaceful or eerie atmospheres or create the dramatic effect you need with the substance and clear texture of these sounds of foliage.


You will get hold of shuffles, breaks, shakes, rustle, hits, punches, and more creative handling, movement, manipulation takes from different perspectives.


These meticulously recorded sounds have both practical usability and room for further sound design. 571 sounds will boost tension, calm, peace, change, drama, and more! Great for film, video, game, and suitable for winds and atmospheric scenes, documentaries and as sweeteners outside of the foliage needs.


Action: Drag, shuffles, break, shake, sweep, rustle, hit, punch, fall, drop, snap handling, movement, manipulation, stress, crunch, impact, squeeze, rummage, rip, cut, footstep, whoosh, peel, grab, tear, rustle, Japanese pine,


Foliage/vegetation: leaf, leaves, grass, stem, twig, bush, branch, tree, dry, wet, with leaves, without leaves, wood, shrub, pine cones, olive, lemon


Style: Fast, hard, medium, slow, soft, in bunches, in intervals, rhythmical, windy, debris, creaky


You will get intuitive, detailed naming, UCS compatibility and the usual Vadi Sound craft and attention to detail in 571 pristine sounds.


Recorded in 24bit-96kHz.WAV stereo format on our favorite Sennheiser MKH 8040 stereo pair and Zoom F3 in A/B and ORTF.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 571

Number of Audio Cues: 571

Sample rate / bit rate: 16 Bit/ 48 Khz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
